question: Why did you choose these color themes?
answer: Simply put, nostalgia. They remind me of the monochrome displays we had in our highschool in 1995, when I started using IBM PCs.

question: How can I contact you?
answer: On the Contact page, you can find my email, cell phone number (on which I have WhatsApp too), and LinkedIn. Also, you can send me a message using the contact form on the same page.

question: What happens to my contact info if I send you a message using the contact form?
answer: Your contact info will not be stored anywhere. It will only be emailed to me along with your message so that I can contact you back. At any point in time, you can send a deletion request to me, and within the next few hours I will delete all your contact info from my email.

question: What kind of projects are you interested in?
answer: Software development projects with C, C++, Go, and web technologies, preferably on Linux, but Windows is fine too.

question: What work models and contracts are you open to?
answer: For the time being, only remote jobs. They can be full-time, part-time, B2B, or freelancer ones.
